      Classes, interfaces, and traits

      CaseInsensitiveArray¶

      CaseInsensitiveArray allows accessing elements with mixed-case keys.

      « More »

      DynamicResponseModel¶

      The DynamicResponseModel class allows flexible and forgiving access to responses from the Postmark API.

      « More »

      PostmarkAttachment¶

      « More »

      PostmarkException¶

      The exception thrown when the Postmark Client recieves an error from the API.

      « More »

      PostmarkAdminClient¶

      The PostmarkAdminClient allows users to access and modify "Account-wide" settings. At this time the API supports management of the "Sender Signatures", and "Servers."

      « More »

      PostmarkClient¶

      PostmarkClient provides the main functionality used to send an analyze email on a "per-Server" basis. If you'd like to manage "Account-wide" configuration, see the PostmarkAdminClient.

      « More »

      PostmarkClientBase¶

      This is the core class that interacts with the Postmark API. All clients should inherit fromt this class.

      « More »
